Unlike most Bitcoiners, high transaction fees on Ethereum actually make me more afraid of Ethereum.  A lot of Bitcoiners laugh at high tx fees on ETH & make fun of it because of the failed "cheaper than bitcoin" narrative.  However, higher fees proves real demand & triggers me.

It takes special hypocrisy to take Consensys money from Gitcoin grant matching, then turn around & claim they are the "deep state" of Ethereum, with a secret agenda to KYC all of Ethereum.  All as a mechanism to rekindle an online presence.  Be smarter than this, folks. Please.
